subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis filed an appeal with the Court of Arbitration for Sport in a last-ditch effort to regain the 2006 Tour de France title stripped from him last month because of doping charges.
snippet: Floyd Landis filed an appeal with the Court of Arbitration for Sport in a last-ditch effort to regain the 2006 Tour de France title stripped from him last month because of doping charges.
